home.description: A private longevity advisory for a small number of clients. Movement, nutrition, sleep, emotional well-being, and medical insight — quietly integrated around your life.

hero.title: Private Longevity Advisory
hero.microline: Quiet, thorough attention to your health

state2.headline: Quiet certainty.
state2.support: Discreet, long-term guidance so your health decisions feel simple — and your vitality stays visible.

capacity.title: 3–5 clients at a time.
capacity.body: This work requires presence — not templates, not delegation. A deliberately small number of clients means each person receives the depth, continuity, and privacy that this kind of collaboration requires.

items.title: Understanding where you are
items.description: Before anything changes, we listen. Four weeks of quiet, private observation — sleep, movement, nutrition, bloodwork, daily rhythms — to understand your health on its own terms.

items.title: A framework built around you
items.description: From your baseline, we shape a structured approach across five dimensions — movement, nutrition, sleep, emotional well-being, and medical data — held between us and built for your life as it is.

items.title: Continuous refinement
items.description: Your framework evolves with you. Through ongoing private conversation, we refine what needs refining — at a pace that respects your time and attention.

about.title: About
about.body:
My background spans psychology, analytics, and over fifteen years of studying how health holds together across its many dimensions. I've worked closely with individuals whose lives leave little room for trial and error — people who need clarity, not more information.

I take on very few clients and stay involved over long periods. Each engagement begins with careful observation, not intervention. The goal is to understand your patterns before shaping anything — and to remain a steady, discreet presence as your health evolves.

items.title: Wearable technology, provided
items.description: The right sensors and devices, selected and configured for you. No research required on your part.

items.title: A private health overview
items.description: All your health data in one place — confidential, reviewed by me personally. Every number comes with context and meaning.

items.title: Weekly clarity
items.description: A short, focused summary each week: what is working, what is shifting, what comes next. Nothing unnecessary.

pillarsPreview.title: Five Dimensions
pillarsPreview.subtitle: Each dimension is part of a system — none stands alone.

items.title: Movement
items.summary: Strength, endurance, and mobility — built to sustain you.

items.title: Nutrition
items.summary: Nourishment that supports your energy — without restriction.

items.title: Sleep
items.summary: The foundation of clarity, recovery, and resilience.

items.title: Emotional Well-being
items.summary: What holds everything together — especially during transitions.

items.title: Medical Insight
items.summary: Bloodwork, biomarkers, and the clarity that comes from knowing.

cta.title: When you're ready.
cta.body: A brief, private conversation to understand what you're looking for. No preparation needed — just honesty about where you are.

hero.title: Five dimensions
hero.body: Longevity is not one discipline — it is five dimensions held in balance. We attend to each individually and as part of an integrated whole.

items.title: Movement
items.description: Strength, cardiovascular health, mobility, and recovery — designed as one integrated framework. We shape your movement practice around your schedule, your history, and your long-term structural well-being. The intention is a body that carries you well — at 40, 60, and beyond.

items.title: Nutrition
items.description: A measured, evidence-informed approach — no ideology, no restriction. We observe biomarkers, energy, and how you feel to find a dietary pattern that genuinely supports your daily life and long-term health.

items.title: Sleep
items.description: Sleep is foundational — to clarity, to resilience, to how everything else holds together. We use wearable data and your own experience to understand your sleep patterns and gently improve their quality and consistency.

items.title: Emotional Well-being
items.description: Stress, relationships, purpose, and inner resilience are not separate from physical health — they are often what holds it together. We attend to the emotional dimensions of longevity with the same care we bring to everything else.

items.title: Medical Insight
items.description: Working alongside your medical team, we observe the markers that matter. Comprehensive bloodwork, appropriate imaging, and longitudinal tracking provide a quiet, objective view of how your body is responding over time.

cta.title: See how it comes together
cta.body: Each dimension supports the others. The result is a framework that deepens over time.

hero.title: How it works
hero.body: Every engagement follows the same three-phase structure. We observe before we act, build with care, and refine for the long term.

phases.title: Observe
phases.description: We don't change anything yet. For four weeks, we collect baseline data — sleep patterns, movement, nutrition, bloodwork, and how you feel. This gives us a clear, unhurried picture of where you are before we consider a single adjustment.

phases.title: Build
phases.description: With a solid understanding in place, we introduce changes one layer at a time across five dimensions. Each adjustment is observed and considered. We move deliberately — adding complexity only when the previous layer has settled.

phases.title: Refine
phases.description: Once the foundation is in place, we shift to maintenance and gentle refinement. Regular conversations, periodic re-assessment, and seasonal adjustments keep things moving — at a pace that respects your life.

steps.title: Share what is on your mind
steps.description: A brief inquiry — about where you are, what matters to you, and what kind of support you are looking for. Nothing formal.

steps.title: A private conversation
steps.description: If there is a good fit, we arrange a calm, unhurried call to explore your situation in more depth and answer any questions.

steps.title: A quiet beginning
steps.description: Once we decide to work together, you receive access to our tools and we begin four weeks of observation. No pressure, no rush.

hero.title: What clients say
hero.body: Reflections from those who have experienced the process. These are placeholder testimonials — to be replaced with real experiences as they come in.

items.quote: The four-week observation period felt slow at first, but it gave us a depth of understanding I hadn't experienced before. For the first time, I felt like someone truly understood my health — not just my numbers.
items.name: James R.

items.quote: I've worked with trainers and nutritionists before, but never with someone who sees all five dimensions together. The integration — and the calm way it is held — is what makes this different.
items.name: Sarah M.

items.quote: What I value most is the patience. No rushed changes, no dramatic overhauls. Just steady, considered progress that I can actually sustain — and that respects the rest of my life.
items.name: David K.

items.quote: The sleep work alone brought something I hadn't expected: a deeper sense of ease during the day. Clarity, mood, recovery — everything downstream shifted. But it was the calm that surprised me most.
items.name: Maria L.

items.quote: I was uncertain about the emotional well-being dimension, but it turned out to be what everything else was waiting for. Once that was held with care, the rest followed naturally.
items.name: Tom W.

items.quote: Having someone who reads my bloodwork, understands my patterns, and connects it all with genuine attention — that level of presence is rare. The small number of clients makes all the difference.
items.name: Elena P.

cta.title: When you're ready.
cta.body: When a place becomes available, we review your inquiry and arrange a private conversation.

hero.title: Built from experience, held with care.
hero.subtitle: Applied Longevity grew from over fifteen years of personal practice and quiet observation — combined with the reality of building companies and navigating a demanding life. The best framework is one that makes your life richer, not smaller.

story.title: Background
story.p1: I have trained seriously for over fifteen years — across disciplines, seasons, and phases of life. Along the way, I began guiding those closest to me, sharing what I had learned. Over time, that care turned into something more structured.
story.p2: Professionally, I have founded two companies and now work in Private Equity. I understand what a demanding life looks like — the early mornings, the travel, the mental weight that never fully lifts. That experience shaped my conviction: health must fit into your real life, not ask you to build a different one.
story.p3: Through my <link>research on leadership</link>, I saw how the right guidance can shape human development — how people grow when someone meets them where they are and holds them accountable with warmth. That insight is what drew me to this work, and it remains the foundation of how I practise.
story.p4: The question that guides me: what does it take to remain strong, clear, and well — not for months, but for decades? The answer is not a single protocol. It is a system — one that integrates movement, nutrition, sleep, emotional well-being, and medical insight into a coherent whole. That is Applied Longevity.

callout.title: My Approach
callout.body: Health should enrich your life, not restrict it. Together we find a way that fits your everyday — without giving up what brings you joy.

observe.title: Observe before you act
observe.description: Every engagement begins with four weeks of quiet observation. We don't change anything until we understand where you truly are — not where you think you are.

roster.title: A small practice, by design
roster.description: I work with three to five clients at a time, for a minimum of six months. This is deliberately not scalable. Genuine attention requires genuine presence.

evidence.title: Evidence over ideology
evidence.description: No trends, no dogma. We observe what works through careful data — bloodwork, wearables, how you feel — and adjust with patience.

life.title: More life, not less
life.description: Health should deepen your well-being without diminishing your joy. We integrate better habits into the life you already have — without stripping away what makes it meaningful.

sustainable.title: Sustainable by nature
sustainable.description: The aim is a framework you can carry for years — not a short-term programme. We build patterns that accumulate quietly over time.

cta.title: When you're ready.
cta.subtitle: If this resonates, I would welcome hearing from you. Every inquiry is read personally.

hero.title: Begin a conversation.
hero.body: This is not a sales form. It is a short, reflective exchange to help us understand what you are looking for — and whether this advisory is the right context for it. Every response is read personally and held in confidence.

form.instructions: Replace this with your Typeform or Tally embed code.

next.title: What follows

steps.title: I read your inquiry personally
steps.description: There is no automated screening. I read every response myself to understand your situation, your priorities, and what kind of support you are looking for.

steps.title: A private conversation
steps.description: If it feels like the right fit for both sides, I will suggest a brief, unhurried call. No pitch — just an honest exchange about where you are and what might help.

steps.title: A considered beginning
steps.description: If we decide to work together, we begin with four weeks of quiet observation. No changes, no pressure — just a careful look at where your health stands today.

next.note: I respond to every inquiry within a few days. If I am at capacity, I will let you know honestly and we can revisit when the timing is right.
